message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_CREATE_CONTRACT_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A new plan group may not be added to this service plan as a contract has already been accepted by this client.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_CREATE_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: You cannot add this plan group as a plan group of this name has already been added to this service plan.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_CREATE_NO_GOAL_DEFINED
message.locale: A plan group may not be added to the service plan until a service plan goal has been defined.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_DELETE_SUBGOALS_EXIST
message.locale: The plan group may not be deleted as it contains one or more sub-goals.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_DELETE_PLANGROUPS_EXIST
message.locale: The plan group may not be deleted as it contains one or more plan groups.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_DELETE_MILESTONES_EXIST
message.locale: The plan group may not be deleted as it contains one or more milestones.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_DELETE_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The plan group may not be deleted as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_PLANCONTENT_LIST_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_PLANCONTENT_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan.

message.name: ERR_PLANNED_GOAL_NOT_EXISTS
message.locale: You cannot create a plan group for this service plan as a goal is not defined.

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PLANNED_GROUP_DELETED
message.locale: This plan group has been deleted and is no longer present on the service plan.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_INSERT_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The plan group may not be inserted as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_PLANGROUP_FV_MODIFY_SERVICEPLAN_CLOSED
message.locale: The plan group may not be modified as the service plan has already been closed.
